Package buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer
    An Analyzer that tokenizes text with StandardTokenizer, normalizes content with CJKWidthFilter, folds case with LowerCaseFilter, forms bigrams of CJK with CJKBigramFilter, split last bigram terms with CJKLastUniGramFilter, and filters stopwords with StopFilter
    CJKLastUniGramFilter
    Tokenize last CJK words as uni-gram.
    CJKLastUniGramFilterFactory
    Creates new instances of CJKLastUniGramFilter for Solr.
    CJKSingleCharQuery
    A query that matches CJK single character.
    CJKSingleCharSupportQueryParser
    A QueryParser that support CJK single character.
